### Highlights

* Oak decline syndromes described quantitatively using phenotypic measures.

* Unsupervised machine learning used to develop phenotypic indexes for oak decline.

* The Phenotypic Decline Index measures oak decline severity.

* The Decline Acuteness Index differentiates chronic and acute oak decline syndromes.

* Oak decline indexes have forest monitoring and management applications.
